```{r, setup}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-starwars
#| fig-cap: A few penguins
starwars |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = height, y = mass, color = gender, size = mass)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Mass",
       y = "Height (in cm)",
       color = "Gender",
       size = "Mass")
```
